text: The 2019–20 Nemzeti Bajnokság I (known as the K&H; férfi kézilabda liga for sponsorship reasons) is the 69th season of the Nemzeti Bajnokság I, Hungarian premier Handball league. == Team information == As in the previous season, 14 teams played in the 2018–19 season. After the 2018–19 season, Ceglédi KKSE and Vecsés SE were relegated to the 2019–20 Nemzeti Bajnokság I/B. They were replaced by two clubs from the 2018–19 Nemzeti Bajnokság I/B; Orosházi FKSE and Váci KSE. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: left;" ! Team ! Location ! Arena !
